ActJudges Act
SubjectPhyllis P. Stevens ** ANNUITY ** The Hon. Ronald G. Stevens **
PrecisGranting of an ANNUITY to PHYLLIS P. STEVENS, survivor of the Hon. Ronald G. Stevens, a Judge of the Court of Queen's Bench of Alberta, effective May 14, 2014.
AttachmentsAttachment
